meanings.definition: A method of determining the potency of a substance by measuring its effect on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioassay showed how strong the medicine was on the mice.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use bioassay to test the impact of chemicals on plants.
meanings.sent3: The bioassay results on the fish made them swim faster than ever before.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a bioassay of joy that infected everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The bioassay of the thunderstorm on the trees was evident in their swaying branches.

meanings.definition: The process of evaluating the biological activity of a substance by testing its effects on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioassay revealed the true nature of the new drug on the rats.
meanings.sent2: Researchers rely on bioassay to understand how chemicals interact with cells.
meanings.sent3: The bioassay of the caterpillars after eating the leaves was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a bioassay of happiness that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The bioassay of the volcano's eruption on the landscape was breathtaking.
